title: Ottsuls Shepherd-Hooks Adjustable for Bird-Feeder Lantern Plant-Hook Garden-Stake - Plant Stand Hanger for Outdoor Flower Basket, Bird Feeder Hanger Weddings Decor

With its upgraded stability feature, this shepherd hook is equipped with 5 base prongs for increased stability, ensuring that your hanging items stay securely in place. No more worries about your bird feeder or lanterns falling off!

The wide range of applications makes this shepherd hook a must-have for any outdoor event. It is perfect for outdoor wedding aisles, hanging flower pots, solar lights, lanterns, candle holders, and so much more. The possibilities are endless!

Crafted from heavy-grade steel and coated with a smooth black powder finish, this shepherd hook is not only rust-free but also highly durable for long-lasting service. It will withstand the test of time and continue to impress with its vintage and stylish look.

Installation is a breeze with the included 4 pieces of ground stakes. The quick assembly and easy height adjustment feature, thanks to the 2-part pole system, make it convenient to set up and customize according to your needs. When not in use, simply disassemble it for easy storage.
